code: export const categoryState={categories:[],addCategoryModal:false,editCategoryModal:{modal:false,cId:null,des:"",status:""},loading:false};export const categoryReducer=(state,action)=>{switch(action.type){/* Get all category */case"fetchCategoryAndChangeState":return{...state,categories:action.payload};/* Create a category */case"addCategoryModal":return{...state,addCategoryModal:action.payload};/* Edit a category */case"editCategoryModalOpen":return{...state,editCategoryModal:{modal:true,cId:action.cId,des:action.des,status:action.status}};case"editCategoryModalClose":return{...state,editCategoryModal:{modal:false,cId:null,des:"",status:""}};case"loading":return{...state,loading:action.payload};default:return state;}};
